Reviews.Title: Easy setup, works as expected, solid product to cut labor costs of running new coax
Reviews.Author: David Ritter
Reviews.Content: Bought for a commercial cctv install to save on labor for the client.  well worth the cost, easy to install and worked first time.  I have a 720 tvl camera on this device with the same model camera on a direct run to the dvr.  there is no difference in the image quality.  note I am not using the 12vdc power transmission via coax to power remote camera but the system does pass 12.73 vdc over 70 ft of rg59 coax.

Reviews.Title: works so far
Reviews.Author: Can you ship stock items faster
Reviews.Content: Seems to be working so far. Good product idea if you have a specific need for it. Will update if necessary.
